Body.Content:
Have you prepared your organizational devices for the May 2025 hotpatch update? Hotpatching offers faster compliance for devices running Windows 11 Enterprise or Education, version 24H2.  
 
When will this happen: 
The May 2025 hotpatch update for Windows 11, version 24H2 and the selection of frequently asked questions and answers are already available. 
 
How this will affect your organization: 
The new FAQ article can help you understand how to use and manage hotpatching for eligible Windows 11, version 24H2 devices. 
 
What you need to do to prepare: 
Read Additional information to find answers to any questions you may have in the following categories: 
  • Hotpatch update definitions 
  • Eligibility and availability of hotpatch updates 
  • Hotpatching on Arm64 devices 
  • Technical information about hotpatch updates 
  • Testing and error information 
  • Additional resources 

Additional information: 
Read todayâ€™s article, Hotpatch for client: Frequently asked questions.

Title: Hotpatch for client: Frequently asked questions
